00155 class NotificationTable {
00156     public:
00157 
00160         ~NotificationTable()
00161         {
00162             NotificationArray* temp = 0;
00163             NotificationArray* notification_array_ptr = m_notification_list.GetFront();
00164             FOREVER
00165             {
00166                 if(notification_array_ptr == 0)
00167                     break;
00168                 temp = notification_array_ptr;
00169                 notification_array_ptr = notification_array_ptr->GetNext();
00170                 delete temp;
00171             }
00172         }
